txt.en:
'Did you find something inside the fort?'

You tell Hórin of the magical implements you found and destroyed.

'So the Angmarim are up to their old tricks? They must have been planning for something even larger than the ritual we witnessed. Good work, [placeholder]. Let's see them try it now!'

'Did you find something inside the fort?'

You tell Hórin of the magical implements you found and destroyed.

'So the Angmarim are up to their old tricks? They must have been planning for something even larger than the ritual we witnessed. Good work, [placeholder]. Let's see them try it now!'

Hórin can be found outside the dwarf-fort Bagud-dum.

You should talk to Hórin.

If Hórin is no longer at Bagud-dum, he can be found at Fellgát.

You found a magical implement used by the Cult of Drugoth in its dark rituals, and know with little doubt that such evil objects as these must be destroyed. You are certain there are more of them to find inside the fort of Bagud-dum.
Talk to Hórin outside the keep of Bagud-dum, or back at Fellgát
Angmarim implements can be found inside Bagud-dum.\n\nYou should destroy Angmarim staves, Angmarim daggers, Angmarim flenses, and phials of blood.
Inside Bagud-dum you found magic implements used by the Cult of Drugoth in its dark rituals.
